de.samdev.absgdx.framework.map

Class AutoTile

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.samdev.absgdx.framework.map.Tile
      • de.samdev.absgdx.framework.map.AutoTile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CollisionGeometryOwner, CollisionListener

    public abstract class AutoTile
extends Tile
    This tile gets its texture automatically from a tileset combined with the GID (from a TMX file) I gets the GID from the properties map and calculates the tileset position back from it. This class is mostly useful in combination with the TmxMapLoader

    • Constructor Detail

      • AutoTile

        public AutoTile(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture tileset,
        int tilewidth,
        int tileheight,
        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> properties)
        Creates a new AutoTile
        Parameters:
        tileset - the tileset
        tilewidth - the width of a single tile (in the tileset, in pixels)
        tileheight - the height of a single tile (in the tileset, in pixels)
        properties - the properties map - must contain the GID

      • AutoTile

        public AutoTile(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture tileset,
        int tilewidth,
        int tileheight,
        int offsetX,
        int offsetY,
        int gapX,
        int gapY,
        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> properties)
        Creates a new AutoTile
        Parameters:
        tileset - the tileset
        tilewidth - the width of a single tile (in the tileset, in pixels)
        tileheight - the height of a single tile (in the tileset, in pixels)
        offsetX - The left offset of the tileset in the file
        offsetY - The top offset of the tileset in the file
        gapX - the gap between the tiles in X direction
        gapY - the gap between the tiles in Y direction
        properties - the properties map - must contain the GID
